item.title: Home Server Setup with Proxmox
item.description: Introduction I have been wanting to setup a home server for a while, and finally got a chance to do it. I have been using a Raspberry Pi 4 stack as my home server for a while, but it is not powerful enough to run some of the services I want to run, also, my initial purpose to setup a home server was to explore Kubernetes, scalability becomes an issue as I would like to run multiple nodes.
